name: Into The Abyss Prototype
description:
Into the Abyss is a game about exploration and power management where you'll take control of a mini-submarine and explore the deep abyss.

-----------------------------------------------------

This is a Prototype that showcase the control and navigation within the ship that was being tested in a facility.

The core features of this prototype are

  • Ship navigation
  • Power management
  • Temperature

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Control

Movement - WASD

Interaction - E

Zoom - Right click
